sentences.en: Do the vanes in the figure rotate clockwise or counterclockwise?
sentences.cn: 图中叶片的旋转方向是顺时针的,还是反时针的?

sentences.en: Explain why the vanes rotate when they are illuminated.
sentences.cn: 试解释:叶片被照亮时为什么会旋转.

sentences.en: Farmers rotate their crops so that the soil will remain fertile.
sentences.cn: 为保持土壤肥力,农民搞作物轮作.

sentences.en: It is best to allow the rotor to rotate freely.
Molecules rotate and vibrate by virtue of their heat.
sentences.cn: 分子因热效应而发生转动和振动.

sentences.en: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentences.cn: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

sentences.en: Rotate the pan halfway through the baking time.
sentences.cn: 烘烤到一半时把盘子转一下。

sentences.en: Rotate the shoulders in their sockets five times.
Stay well away from the helicopter when its blades start to rotate.
sentences.cn: 直升机的螺旋桨开始转动时，尽量离远点儿。

sentences.en: Take each foot in both your hands and rotate it to loosen and relax the ankle.
sentences.cn: 双手抓住自己的双脚，转动一下，以放松脚踝。

sentences.en: The dial index will rotate in azimuth, giving an incorrect heading reading.
sentences.cn: 读数示标会绕方位轴转动, 给出不正确的航向读数.

sentences.en: The doctor asked the patient to rotate his eyes.
sentences.cn: 医生叫病人转动一下眼球.

sentences.en: The Earth rotates on its axis once every 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 地球每24小时绕地轴自转一周。

sentences.en: The shaft and discs rotate at about forty revolutions per second.
sentences.cn: 竖轴和磁盘每秒钟大约旋转40转.

sentences.en: This large gear turns the small one to rotate the cylinder.
sentences.cn: 这个大齿轮带动小齿轮使滚筒旋转.

sentences.en: With a low-pitched rumbling noise, the propeller began to rotate.
sentences.cn: 伴随着隆隆的低沉噪声，螺旋桨开始旋转起来。

sentences.en: You can rotate the wheel with your hand.

words.tran_cn: 可旋转的；可转动的；可循环的
旋转的；使回转的；轮流的；引起旋转的
旋转式机器；[动力] 转缸式发动机
旋转；使…转动；循环（rotate的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to turn with a circular movement around a central point, or to make something do this

trans.tran_cn: （使某物）旋转，使转动，使轮流，轮换，交替
